Leonardo: "What made me accept the offer from Milan is the great interest in football, a large, young and capable structure that wants to be successful, and the mode of choice made me very happy."

Leonardo: "I have also met other people, not just Juventus. We are still linked to FFP, so it won't be a crazy transfer market, but a wise, intelligent and moderate transfer market."

Leonardo: "Bonucci? The situation start from the desire of Bonucci. The rest is to be seen. It is not an obligation, we must see if there's a possibility."

Leonardo: "The spraying from fans? I understand the reactions and the respect, it is understandable."
Leonardo: "The returns are always difficult, here at Milan is a piece of my life. Realizing something where is my second home is the biggest challenge."

Leonardo: "It is a team that has played a very good season, also showing the growth of many players. There are also players who have played less, and they maybe want to fix that. There is player who will leave."

Leonardo: "Higuain and Morata? I do not think it will be possible to make a big investmest in the first transfer market."
咁 清咁啲人先

Leonardo: "Gattuso? My point of view is shared with the ownership, Gattuso was the first confirmed in the statement by Elliott. No one has ever spoken with Conte or thinking about changing Gattuso."

撚撚save
Leonardo: "This team has its own identity, it has many players who will play their 2nd year together, then will we see who we will buy."
btw 意甲新賽季好似唔會將打吡同豪門戰放周中

Leonardo: "There are no offers for Donnarumma and Reina, it is an almost balanced duo, a great young goalkeeper and a player who has done everything in his career, which brings experience. I think the situation can be easily managed."

Leonardo: "High salaries are clearly going to have an impact and make it harder to get those big names."
呢樣真係好攞命

Leonardo: "I have a role linked to the team and the sporting part. I saw interest in football from the leaders of the club. There are still so many things to understand and put into practice, we need time."
Leonardo: "Gattuso's targets coincide with mine. The three roles (mezzala, winger and striker) are confirmed but it's all part of the puzzle, it depends on the market."
Leonardo: "The new T.Silva and Kaka? You have to follow them for a year and a half, the family, how they grow and what is their dreams. We do not have that kind of time today, so it's difficult."

Leonardo: "There were a lot of negotiations going on for Kalinic, and there is not only Atletico Madrid. Andre Silva is in a different situation, it's a case of more what he wants, and what he can give."

Paolo Scaroni: "Elliott's strategy is to bring Milan back to its rightful position despite the constraints of Financial Fair Play."

replies.msg:
Milan and Juve have found the right formula for the signing of Gonzalo Higuain - a €20m paid loan with an obligation to buy at €35m. [Gazzetta dello Sport]

An agreement for Higuain (who Juve really want to get rid of) could unblock the swap deal that would send Caldara to Milan and Bonucci to Juve. The bianconeri are willing to let Caldara go, but want Milan to take Higuain with them as well. [Gazzetta dello Sport]

However, there is also another team lurking in the back. Juventus sporting director Fabio Paratici will be in Nice today to meet with Chelsea who are also ready to make an offer for Caldara. [Gazzetta dello Sport]

The Juventus club has reiterated its willingness to sell the Argentinian striker, confirming that the most concrete solution is that of the onerous loan to Milan (20 million the cost of the loan, with a right of redemption to 35 million euros).

Formula, this, which does not entirely convince the Higuain brothers, will now touch Leonardo in the meeting the program in the coming hours to convince the Pipita explaining that the formula of the operation (loan with right of redemption in fact) is only necessary for budget issues and that Higuain in the Rossoneri's ideas will be a point of reference for the present and for the future.

Having clarified this aspect, it will always be up to the Rossoneri manager to present an adequate economic offer to extract the yes of Higuain and his brother-agent. So a meeting between Leonardo and Nicolas Higuain that will be crucial for the future of the Bianconeri striker.
